precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items.
instruction: Sit upright, ensuring that you're not leaning onto the mat or the table.
Place your right hand flat on the table with your palm facing down.
Bring all your fingers together so that there's no space in between your fingers.
Spread your fingers out all the way.
Repeat the action of bringing your fingers together and then spreading them out all the way.
